objectif.title: Objective
objectif.text: Summer internship (3 and a half months) in databases and back-end development.

list: Software Development, Object-oriented design and Agile development, Network Architecture...
Numerous group projects using Git in C++, Java...

elements.school_name: IUT Robert Schuman (University Institute of Technology).
list: Erasmus semester at the Via University, Horsens, Denmark.
Data structure and fundamental algorithms, Advanced Programming (Java)...
Design, development, and production implementation of a software for the managers to automatically test their projects. Reduced their testing workload by 50%. Python, Flask, SQLAlchemy, and VueJS.
Contribution to several back-end Python projects for customers in the retail industry (Jules, Darjeeling, Webedia)
Creation of the registration page (Angular framework) to make the registration easier for a teenager's association.
Creation of web-slides (HTML/CSS/JS) for a big pharmaceutical company (Biogaran).

elements.text: Personal cloud project - Creation of my own cloud.
list: Hosted on a Raspberry Pi, 500Go storage capacity.
Creation of algorithm contests e.g. Le Shaker (1000 participants, national).

elements.text: Academic project: Delivery (Java, team of 6, Agile management).
list: Calculate the shortest path (Travelling salesman algorithm).
Read data from air sensors from a CSV file.
Perform multiple operations to display information (quality of air on a certain territory, amount of a certain gas).

elements.text: Score manager of the annual theque competition (French baseball, 400 young participants).
Python, Java, C++, Git, SQL, Flask (Python), SQLAlchemy (Python), HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Materialize (CSS), Bootstrap (CSS).
C, C#, Shell (UNIX), PL/SQL, NodeJs, ReactJs, Angular (JS), VueJS, NextJs, Unity, Laravel (PHP), Adobe Premiere Pro, Word office suite.

NoSQL, Rust, SAS, assembly language,
Adobe Photoshop, Blender.
